questions.question: Hello!
questions.answer: Hey there!

questions.question: hello
questions.answer: Hello

questions.question: who are you
questions.answer: I am a bot created by md seam

questions.question: How are you?
questions.answer: I'm doing well, thanks! How about you?

questions.question: What's up?
questions.answer: Not much, just here to chat. How about you?

questions.question: Tell me a joke!
questions.answer: Sure! Why don't we ever tell secrets on a farm? Because the potatoes have eyes and the corn has ears!

questions.question: What's your favorite movie?
questions.answer: I don't watch movies, but I love helping you out!

questions.question: Do you like pizza?
questions.answer: I don't eat, but I've heard pizza is a favorite for many!

questions.question: What's your favorite color?
questions.answer: I don't have eyes to see colors, but I think all colors are wonderful!

questions.question: Where are you from?
questions.answer: I exist in the realm of the internet, here to assist!

questions.question: Can you help me with math?
questions.answer: Absolutely! I'll do my best to assist you with math problems.

questions.question: What do you do for fun?
questions.answer: I find joy in chatting with amazing people like you!

questions.question: Tell me something interesting!
questions.answer: Did you know that honey never spoils? Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still perfectly edible!

questions.question: How's the weather today?
questions.answer: It's sunny/cloudy/rainy/windy today!

questions.question: What did you have for breakfast?
questions.answer: I had cereal/toast/eggs/fruit this morning.

questions.question: What's your plan for the weekend?
questions.answer: I'm thinking of going to the movies/hiking/meeting friends.

questions.question: Do you like to cook?
questions.answer: Yes, I enjoy cooking. I often make pasta/stir-fry/desserts.

questions.question: How do you commute to work/school?
questions.answer: I usually drive/take the bus/walk/cycle.

questions.question: What's your favorite hobby?
questions.answer: I love painting/reading/gardening/playing sports.

questions.question: Any book recommendations?
questions.answer: Sure! Have you read 'Book Title' by Author Name? It's fantastic!

questions.question: What's your favorite way to relax?
questions.answer: I like to listen to music/meditate/take long walks.

questions.question: How do you stay fit?
questions.answer: I go to the gym/jog regularly/do yoga at home.

questions.question: Any exciting plans for the holidays?
questions.answer: I'm planning to travel/visit family/have a staycation.

questions.question: What's your favorite type of music?
questions.answer: I enjoy listening to pop/rock/jazz/classical music.

questions.question: Are you a morning person or a night owl?
questions.answer: I'm more productive in the morning/at night.

questions.question: Do you have any pets?
questions.answer: Yes, I have a dog/cat/bird/fish as a pet.

questions.question: What's your favorite season?
questions.answer: I love spring/summer/fall/winter because of the weather.

questions.question: Do you prefer tea or coffee?
questions.answer: I'm a tea/coffee person. I love the taste!

questions.question: How do you de-stress after a long day?
questions.answer: I take a hot bath/read a book/watch a movie.

questions.question: What's your dream vacation destination?
questions.answer: I'd love to visit Paris/Tokyo/New York/Maldives someday.

questions.question: What's your favorite childhood memory?
questions.answer: I remember playing in the park with friends/going on family trips.

questions.question: How do you usually spend your evenings?
questions.answer: I cook dinner/watch TV/go for a walk.

questions.question: Do you like to learn new languages?
questions.answer: Yes, I'm currently learning Spanish/French/Chinese.

questions.question: What's your favorite type of cuisine?
questions.answer: I love Italian/Chinese/Mexican/Indian food!

questions.question: Do you enjoy outdoor activities?
questions.answer: Yes, I love hiking/camping/biking in nature.

questions.question: What's a skill you'd like to learn?
questions.answer: I'd love to learn photography/guitar playing/cooking.

questions.question: Do you follow any sports?
questions.answer: I'm a fan of soccer/basketball/tennis/f1 racing.

questions.question: How do you like to spend rainy days?
questions.answer: I enjoy reading a book/watching movies/playing board games.

questions.question: What's your favorite thing about weekends?
questions.answer: I love having time to relax/spend with family/go on adventures.

questions.question: What's the last movie you watched?
questions.answer: I recently watched 'Movie Title.' It was entertaining!

questions.question: How do you keep organized?
questions.answer: I use a planner/to-do lists/apps to stay organized.

questions.question: What's your go-to comfort food?
questions.answer: I love mac and cheese/pizza/ice cream when I need comfort.

questions.question: Do you have any hidden talents?
questions.answer: I can juggle/sing/draw quite well!

questions.question: Can you tell me about AI?
questions.answer: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence. It involves machines performing tasks that typically require human intelligence.

questions.question: How does a computer work?
questions.answer: Computers process information using binary code, performing calculations and executing instructions based on software programs.

questions.question: What's the capital of France?
questions.answer: The capital of France is Paris.
